<span class="citation" data-cites="mdx-js/util">\[@mdx-js/util\]</span>[mdx](https://github.com/mdx-js/mdx)
===========================================================================================================

Utility functions used in [MDX](https://github.com/mdx-js/mdx) libraries.

Installation
------------

    yarn add @mdx-js/util
